issues module¶

issues.add_delayed(curr_time, delayed_pkgs, package_hash, priority_dict)¶

If any packages have reached their delayed time, they are added to the appropriate package list.

Parameters

  • curr_time (datetime.time) – the time to check packages

  • delayed_pkgs (list[str]) – list of delayed package ids

  • package_hash (ChainingHashTable[str, Package]) – the Package objects

  • priority_dict (dict[datetime.time -> list[str]]) – package lists associated with each deadline

Returns

issues.check_issues(truck_time, delayed, priority_dict, package_hash)¶

Checks the status of all issues of delayed packages and addresses them.

Parameters

  • truck_time (datetime.time) – the time to check the status

  • delayed (list[str]) – list of package ids that are delayed

  • priority_dict (dict[datetime.time -> list[str]]) – package lists associated with each deadline

  • package_hash (ChainingHashTable[str, Package]) – the Package objects

Returns

issues.fix_address(pkg_id, new_address, package_hash)¶

Replaces the current address of a package with a new address.

Parameters

  • pkg_id (str) – id of the package

  • new_address (str) – the new address of the package

  • package_hash (ChainingHashTable[str, Package]) – the Package objects

Returns
